import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forgot-password', templateUrl: './forgot-password.component.html', styleUrls: ['./forgot-password.component.css'] }) export class ForgotPasswordComponent { constructor(private userService:UserService){} username:string = "" answer:string = "" correct:boolean = false; }
